divs: Sighting DetailsA bright soft orange boomerang shape object flew steadily about 10-15 feet away from my window on the morning of October 6. It's size was about as big as a flying crow. First it looked like a bended stick to me, that was steadily flying with its wide part facing the direction it was going. It was still pretty dark outside so i didnt see any more details other then the orange glow. very strange. This is my 3rd sighting from the window, but I was surprised because I've never heard of flying sticks. It's usually orange orbs seems like.
Summary: A bright orange glowing stick/boomerang flew by window in the morning about 10-15 feel away from me.
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There was one other sighting in Seattle on or around October 6th 2010
